welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weatherford! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Weatherford has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mineral Wells Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mineral Wells Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport provides services for general aviation and private aircraft.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Addison Airport caters to commercial and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport houses all of the necessary amenities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages, and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for efficient handling and storage.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
